mapper.select: SELECT O.*, OBJECTIONSTATE(O.SBJNO, O.STNO) AS OBJSTATE FROM OBJECTION O WHERE sbjno = #{sbjno} ORDER BY O.NO DESC

SELECT PS.CODENAME AS SEASONCODE, S.NAME, PD.CODENAME AS DEPTCODE, PT.CODENAME AS TYPE, ST.NAME AS STNAME, O.*, GRADETOALPHABET(G.TOTAL) AS ALPHABET, GRADETOPOINT(G.TOTAL) AS TOTAL, OBJECTIONSTATE(O.SBJNO, O.STNO) AS OBJSTATE FROM SUBJECT S, OBJECTION O, STUDENT ST, GRADE G, PUBLICCODE PS, PUBLICCODE PD, PUBLICCODE PT WHERE S.NO = O.SBJNO AND O.STNO = ST.NO AND O.SBJNO = G.SBJNO AND PS.NO = S.SEASONCODE AND PD.NO = S.DEPTCODE AND PT.NO = S.TYPE AND S.PFNO = ${pfNo} AND S.SEASONCODE = #{seasonCode} ORDER BY O.NO DESC

SELECT O.NO, S.NAME, ST.NAME AS STNAME, OBJECTIONSTATE(O.SBJNO, O.STNO) AS OBJSTATE, O.CONTENT, O.ANSWER FROM SUBJECT S, OBJECTION O, STUDENT ST WHERE S.NO = O.SBJNO AND O.STNO = ST.NO AND O.NO = ${objNo}
mapper.insert:
